comment.author: 60139144@N00
comment._content: On the lower right corner is St. Louis Cathedral, with a park in front of it and the two Pontalba buildings flanking the park.  The Jax Brewery is the first building by the river in the bottom center of the picture.

comment.author: 22694125@N02
comment._content: Congratulations! This is a wonderful shot! You are invited to post it to: artland
